definition: to welcome/to meet/to face/to forge ahead (esp. in the face of difficulties)
to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

sentences.english: The eastern edge of Willow River seem to elongation, and fluttered in the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 東面緣河兩岸的楊柳似乎也伸長了，迎風招展。

sentences.english: The red flag flaunt in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 紅旗迎風招展如何表達？

sentences.english: Beneath the feet of dancing flowers.
sentences.chinese: 躺在迎風招展的花朵腳下。
